name: The Big Flu
description:
This is a comedy game for RPG Maker Game Jam 3. The theme was "contagious" so I decided that your regular hero was sick but still needed to do his job. I don't know if it's actually funny, or even fun. I had a great time making it and hopefully you enjoy playing even a bit! This gave me an opportunity to use a bunch of music I've always wanted to use for a game. Huge thanks to my musician Ryan Murphy for making most of these tracks. If you really want to support me please check out my youtube channels, twitter, or twitch!

https://www.youtube.com/bitbattlebrothers

https://twitter.com/assassinathan

https://twitch.tv/TheAssassinathan

Or peeps my patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/assassinathan

Thanks!
